description: Episode of Series "This Modern Age". A survey of the geographical, political, social, racial, religious and military influences which make up modern Malaya, shown in relation to communist guerilla warfare on the peninsula. Explains the conflicting aims and ideas of the four distinct racial groups: Malay, Chinese, Indian and European.
